5. Since the "signed" column value for John Herbst from USC indicates "no twins - 1967", it does not contradict the claim that USC has no twin-1967 listed under the signed category, but also doesn't confirm the claim due to the presence of a note about the absence of twins. However, we can still conclude that the absence of a "yes" value in the "signed" column for any player from USC supports the claim when considering only players without such notes.
